
## NeuralSampler - Pytorch

Implementation of Neural Sampler. 

## Install

``` bash
$ pip install neuralsampler
```

## Usage

```python
import torch
from neuralsampler import neuralsampler
```




this repo is to collect all the random results and reproduce the experiments here
